buildList() - Method in class BuildMovies
buildList Method.
BuildMovies - Class in <Unnamed>
BuildMovies class
Initializes the array of Movie objects
Uses a counter to set the name of movies
Uses Random to set the year, time, genre, and rating for each movie
Then adds movie to array which is passed in constructor
BuildMovies() - Constructor for class BuildMovies
Default Constructor
--Not Used--
Instantiates an empty array of new movies
BuildMovies(Movie[]) - Constructor for class BuildMovies
Overloaded Constructor
----------------
Description:
Takes movieArray as a parameter for use in buildList method

D

display() - Method in class MovieDisplay
display Method
--------------
Description:
Loops through the array of Movies and uses the displayMovie method from Movie class to display their information
Try-Catch to handle running into empty part of the array
displayMovie() - Method in class Movie
displayMovie Method
------------------
Description:
Prints the information about the movie

main(String[]) - Static method in class useMovies
main Method
--------------
Description:
Instantiates the array then calls BuildMovies to initialize the array
Then calls MovieMenu which displays menu and handles input
Movie - Class in <Unnamed>
Movie Class
Holds variables for name, year, time, genre, and rating
Has methods for name comparison, display the movie, and getters for the variables (used in sorts)

MovieMenu - Class in <Unnamed>
MovieMenu Class
Uses a do while loop to display menu until exit is called
Uses InputStreamReader to read input from System in and passes it to BufferedReader for processing
MovieMenu() - Constructor for class MovieMenu
Default Constructor
--Not Used--
Instantiates a new array of 35 Movie objects

Overloaded Constructor
-----------------
Description:

MovieSearch - Class in <Unnamed>
MovieSearch Class
Class to search through an array of Movies to check for matches
Uses Movie nameCheck method which returns true if the names match
And Movie genreCheck method which returns true if the genres match
MovieSearch() - Constructor for class MovieSearch
Default Constructor
--Not Used--
Creates a new array of Movie and sets name to null
MovieSearch(Movie[]) - Constructor for class MovieSearch
Overloaded Constructor
------------
Description:
Takes movieArray as parameter for use in startSearch method

---------------
Description:

SortMovies - Class in <Unnamed>
SortMovies Class
Gets the length of the movie array and then uses quickSort to sort the array of movies

startSearch(String, int) - Method in class MovieSearch
startSearch Method
------------
Description:
Starts the search by using a for loop to iterate through the array
For every match found it uses the Movie displayMovie method to print the Movie information
If no match is found it prints that Movie was not found

U

useMovies - Class in <Unnamed>
Movie List Driver Program
Creates an array of 35 Movie objects
Uses class BuildMovies to initialize the array
Then uses class MovieMenu to display the menu
useMovies() - Constructor for class useMovies
